about_the_game:
This DLC is an expansion of Touhou Mystia's Izakaya, it includes:

A new region to explore - Lunar Capital!
You can freely explore the Lunar Capital
New bond characters
A mysterious new partner
A variety of new ingredients
A variety of new recipes
Three new vibe songs and a new overworld song!

A new region to explore - Makai!
You can freely explore Makai
New bond characters
A mysterious new partner
A variety of new ingredients
A variety of new recipes
Three new vibe songs and a new overworld song!

This is the final chapter of the story, so in order to access Makai and the Lunar Capital, you need to have at least completed the base game.

You'll gain a greater understanding of this story if you own DLC1. Completing DLC1 before accessing this DLC's content will give you the best experience, but not having DLC1 isn't an issue, of course!

The mysterious location which has only appeared once in official manga—the Lunar Capital, and the stories of the residents which reside on it.
The infamous location which even ZUN pretends to not exist, and has also made only one appearance—Makai, and the stories of the residents therein.

As the final chapter in Mystia's story, the theme of "friendship" will be very strongly present
This DLC will also tie a bow on the game's story and finally draw the curtains on Mystia's Izakaya.

So, what characters and situations will Mystia encounter on her final adventure?

In February 2024, join our beloved bird-brain for one final adventure, filled with lots of laughter, and maybe some tears.

PS: Due to a lack of material in ZUN's canon for the characters in this DLC, we've had no choice but to add our own canon to flesh out the characters and make them more complete. We ask for your understanding in this matter. If this bothers you, then it is not recommended that you purchase this DLC.
And to reiterate on what was said last time:
"
We hope the new content will be a vast improvement to the game.
However, with the DLCs coming this far, some overlap is inevitable.
Our purpose for releasing these DLCs is not only to expand upon the gameplay, but also to create a more complete world of Gensokyo, as well as give more characters the chance to appear on-screen.

We hope this update can bring some comfort to those who like the more obscure characters, and we hope those who don't usually give much attention to these obscure characters can be reintroduced to their adorable likeness.
"

Have fun, and have a happy new year!

name: Touhou Mystia's Izakaya DLC5 Pack - Makai & Lunar Capital

short_description: This DLC is an expansion of Touhou Mystia's Izakaya. It adds the Lunar Capital and Makai. It also adds 6 new bond characters in addition to a myriad of other new characters, as well as an abundance of new content.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
